entry.summary: 据 Bernstein 的研究报告，稳定币市场预计在未来五年内将从现有的1250亿美元增长到2.8万亿美元。分析师表示，预计全球主要金融和消费平台将发行联名稳定币以推动其平台上的价值交换。报告还指出，稳定币监管比加密货币监管更受政治支持。

entry.title: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to ...
entry.summary: Re @RNR_0 Technically it’s not a probability of 1/6. If 5/6 chambers are empty then bullet will be heavier. So when you spin it it’s more likely to not be at the top hole, because gravity.
